original_text: and he saw two boats by the lake, but the fishermen had gone out of them and were washing their nets.
korean_text: 호숫가에 배 두 척이 있는 것을 보시니 어부들은 배에서 나와서 그물을 씻는지라

sentences.original_text: and he saw two boats by the lake
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 호숫가에 두 척의 배를 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: but the fishermen had gone out of them
